articles.title: Study of J&J shot shows Covid-19 infections halved in health workers - News24
articles.description: Johnson & Johnson's Covid-19 vaccine cuts the risk of getting infected with the disease by about half, according to the latest results of a trial involving almost half a million health workers in South Africa.
